description:
Matsunaga Hisahide, the rock star of the Warring States era, makes an appearance in the neighborhood.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rock Da ze!!! Kawaii: Saikyou no Kan Arawaru!?
Rock `n Roll!!! Adorable: Bad News of a Man!?
روك أند رول!!! جذّاب! أنباء سيئة عن رجل؟
ロックだぜ!!! かわいい・最凶の漢現る!?
